t: Amazon might buy Simon & Schuster - Good e-Reader
s: March 5, 2020 - One of the front-runners is Amazon, who insiders say would be better suited to own it, than anyone else. S&S is apart of the big 5 publishing companies, and it looks like the company that owns them, is not very interested in keeping them around, if they receive a big offer.
